title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: Scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are enabled and movable, but they are not functional.
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they don't have any effect when attempting to scroll.
EB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars should be disabled and not movable.
SR:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but don't have any effect on scrolling.
3. Open a small image, such as an icon, and verify that the scrollbars are still enabled and movable but do not have any effect.
